description: Several easy trails for a nice leisurely stroll that won't take all day.  Trails can be combined into longer loops.  Includes gardens, rare plant life, and a nature centre.  There are great opportunities for wildlife viewing and bird watching right inside the city.
directions: -College Ave to East Ring Rd.-south on East Ring Rd.-East Ring Rd. to Arboretum Rd.-east on Arboretum Rd.-Arboretum Rd to the Arboretum entrance kiosk.-parking is available at the entrance kiosk or further down the Rd. at the Arboretum Centre.
title: University of Guelph Arboretum
